description.zh-cn: 香港创作男歌手及演员，拥有马来西亚、阿拉伯及华裔血统。持有加拿大国籍和香港永久居留权。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer-songwriter and actor of Malay, Arab, and Chinese descent. He holds Canadian citizenship and Hong Kong permanent residency.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的一所小学。
description.en: A primary school located in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的一所中学。
description.en: A secondary school located in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国伦敦的一所世界顶尖公立研究型大学。
description.en: A world-leading public research university located in London, United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一家唱片公司及艺人经纪公司。
description.en: A record label and artist management company in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 一家艺人经纪公司。
description.en: An artist management company.

description.zh-cn: 一家艺人经纪公司。
description.en: An artist management company.

description.zh-cn: 2010年香港电影，李治廷在其中担任主演。
description.en: A 2010 Hong Kong film starring Aarif Rahman.

description.zh-cn: 2014年中国大陆电视剧，李治廷在其中饰演唐高宗李治。
description.en: A 2014 mainland Chinese television series in which Aarif Rahman played Emperor Gaozong of Tang (Li Zhi).

description.zh-cn: 2013年中国大陆浪漫喜剧电影，由李治廷和范冰冰主演。
description.en: A 2013 mainland Chinese romantic comedy film starring Aarif Rahman and Fan Bingbing.

description.zh-cn: 2017年动作喜剧电影，由李治廷和成龙主演。
description.en: A 2017 action-comedy film starring Aarif Rahman and Jackie Chan.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第三位皇帝。
description.en: The third emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 香港女歌手。
description.en: A Hong Kong female singer.

description.zh-cn: 香港男歌手，亚洲星光大道3班殿军。
description.en: A Hong Kong male singer, third runner-up of Asian Millionstar 3.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员、导演及电影制作人。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor, director, and film producer.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演、编剧及监制。
description.en: A Hong Kong film director, screenwriter, and producer.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌手卫兰的英文专辑。
description.en: An English album by Hong Kong singer Janice Vidal.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员、歌手、制片人。
description.en: A Chinese actress, singer, and producer.

description.zh-cn: 李治廷于1987年2月26日出生于香港。
description.en: Aarif Rahman was born in Hong Kong on February 26, 1987.

description.zh-cn: 李治廷的祖籍是马来西亚。
description.en: Aarif Rahman's ancestral home is in Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 2008年于伦敦帝国学院物理系毕业。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Physics at Imperial College London in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 2009年至2016年期间，李治廷签约东亚唱片(A Music)及其经纪公司百仕活。
description.en: From 2009 to 2016, Aarif Rahman was signed to the record label A Music and its management company.

description.zh-cn: 李治廷凭借其在电影《岁月神偷》中的演出，获得了第29届香港电影金像奖“最佳新演员奖”。
description.en: For his performance in the film 'Echoes of the Rainbow', Aarif Rahman won the Best New Performer award at the 29th Hong Kong Film Awards.

description.zh-cn: 凭借在电视剧《武媚娘传奇》中饰演唐高宗李治一角，李治廷在中国大陆人气急升，并获得第17届华鼎奖中国古代题材电视剧最佳男演员。
description.en: His role as Emperor Gaozong of Tang (Li Zhi) in the TV series 'The Empress of China' led to a surge in his popularity in mainland China and earned him the Best Actor in a Chinese historical drama at the 17th Huading Awards.

description.zh-cn: 凭借电影《一夜惊喜》，李治廷获得第1届伦敦国际华语电影节最佳新锐演员奖。
description.en: With the film 'One Night Surprise', Aarif Rahman won the Best Newcomer award at the 1st London International Chinese Film Festival.

description.zh-cn: 李治廷为卫兰的英文专辑《Morning》全碟包办歌词，并与她多次合唱歌曲，如《为你钟情》。
description.en: Aarif Rahman wrote all the lyrics for Janice Vidal's English album 'Morning' and has collaborated with her on several songs, such as 'For You'.

description.zh-cn: 李治廷为卫兰的英文专辑《Morning》全碟包办歌词。
description.en: Aarif Rahman wrote all the lyrics for Janice Vidal's English album 'Morning'.

description.zh-cn: 李治廷与谭焌钊是同学。
description.en: Aarif Rahman and Tam Chun-chiu were classmates.

description.zh-cn: 李治廷与成龙合作出演动作喜剧电影《功夫瑜伽》。
description.en: Aarif Rahman co-starred with Jackie Chan in the action-comedy film 'Kung Fu Yoga'.

description.zh-cn: 在电影《功夫瑜伽》合作后，导演唐季礼盛赞李治廷“像25年前的成龙”。
description.en: After their collaboration on the film 'Kung Fu Yoga', director Stanley Tong praised Aarif Rahman, saying he was 'like Jackie Chan 25 years ago'.

description.zh-cn: 李治廷与范冰冰合作主演电影《一夜惊喜》并合唱同名主题曲。
description.en: Aarif Rahman co-starred with Fan Bingbing in the film 'One Night Surprise' and they sang the theme song of the same name together.
